item.title: Crypto studies. Why?
item.description: Beginning As a crypto investor and enthusiast, Iâ€™d be unhappy to not study and analyze its market. After finishing this work, I was very tired and wanted to do a quick project which could make me happy. So I called a friend in Rio and invited him to make a project submission to the annual excellent event SER (International Seminar of Statistics with R) which is hosted and created by UFF (Universidade Federal Fluminense).
